channel.title: Ad Nauseam
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i838.photobucket.com/albums/zz305/stuartperera/Untitled-1-7_zps9c24d4a1.png[/img][/center]
So, as I continue to work on Vicious Revolution, I just can't stand the server I am looking at it. Although it is one of the more advanced PI servers out there, it still doesn't make me happy. I decided to start a framework from scratch with the help of the released tutorial. This framework hopefully can be used by MITB since I am going to meet all his specifications so he can pay me to release it under the GNPU license or whatever it is.
As of now, I have login working. I am now working on Packets so I can get maps and characters to load.
I will add more media as I finish packet handling.
[img]http://puu.sh/24vHo[/img]

item.title: Ad Nauseam
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

Good luck, definitely a good learning experience.
Also, lay off guys. Whatever happens, he still learns a lot from this, and ultimately can make his work better.

Read full topic

item.title: Ad Nauseam
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

[quote=“Yesteryear, post:3, topic:488996”]So lets get this straight:

  • You followed a tutorial to create a basic login server.
  • You don’t seem to have much experience with networking.
  • You expect MITB to pay you for following a tutorial.
  • profit?

Well, good luck I guess.[/quote]- Basic Login server, yes

  • Not IO/NIO, I understand a lot more now
  • Not pay me for following a tutorial
  • maybe?

Thanks?

Read full topic
